name: Jabalpur Vavsayik Prashikchan And Samaj Kalyan Samiti
briefDescription: increase the access to formal and non-formal vocational education programme as a tool for social and rural development through learning center’s, schools & college’s , IT, health, art education & research, Women empowerment, economic & vocational affords for handicapped , deaf ,dumb child., emphasis on the Skill Development for self employment  for youth, literacy, training for the beneficiaries, participatory activities like work shop’s, seminar’s, field  visits, Better employability
